EManual-CLI
-----------

Command Line Interface for EManual

install
-------
```shell
pip install emanual
```

Usage
-----
```shell
cd path/to/md-xxx
emanual create //create info.json
````

Development
-----------

```shell
//create you virtual python envirment
virtualenv env
source env/bin/activate

//exit
activate
```
